Package Code

Class WorkerClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • Code.WorkerClass
  • public class WorkerClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    dhruv This class contains all the methods that do the calculations in the background. It handles the data and returns it in the correct form.

    • Method Detail

      • actionSelection

        public static double actionSelection​(int attribute,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Country> C,
                                     int action)
        This function is part of a set of overloaded functions that calls the respective number manipulation functions
        Parameters:
        attribute - is the first attribute that must be used
        C - contains an ArrayList of type Country containing all the data to be manipulated
        action - is the user selected action
        Returns:
        a double value of the associated number action

      • actionSelection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Country> actionSelection​(int attribute,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<Country> C,
                                                           int action,
                                                           int attribute2,
                                                           int order)
        This function is part of a set of overloaded functions that calls the sorting functions
        Parameters:
        attribute - is the first attribute that must be used
        C - contains an ArrayList of type Country containing all the data to be manipulated
        action - is the user selected action
        attribute2 - is the second attribute to be used
        order - specifies whether it is in ascending or descending order
        Returns:
        ArrayList of type Country containing sorted list

      • actionSelection

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Country> actionSelection​(int attribute,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<Country> C,
                                                           int action,
                                                           java.lang.String searchItem)
        This function is part of a set of overloaded functions that calls the Search functions
        Parameters:
        attribute - is the first attribute that must be used
        C - contains an ArrayList of type Country containing all the data to be manipulated
        action - is the user selected action
        searchItem - contains the value to be searched
        Returns:
        ArrayList of type Country containing a list of items found

      • meanValue

        public static double meanValue​(int attribute,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Country> C)
        This method returns the mean value of the selected attribute
        Parameters:
        attribute - contains the attribute to be used
        C - contains an ArrayList of type Country containing all the data to be manipulated
        Returns:
        double value that is the mean of the selected attribute over the entire data set

      • quickSort

        public static void quickSort​(int attribute,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Country> C,
                             int begin,
                             int end,
                             int order)
        This method sorts the data according to the Quick sort algorithm
        Parameters:
        attribute - is the selected attribute according the data needs to be sorted
        C - is the ArrayList of type Country that contains the data set to be sorted
        begin - is the index of the beginning of the data set
        end - is the index of the end of the data set
        order - is order in which the data needs to be sorted, ascending or descending

      • search

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Country> search​(int attribute,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<Country> C,
                                                  Attributes a)
        This method searches for all the objects that contain a specific value of the selected attribute
        Parameters:
        attribute - is the attribute which needs to be searched
        C - is the ArrayList of type Country that contains the data set to be searched
        a - is an object of type Attribute which contains the value to be searched
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of type Country that counts the objects that contain the searched value

      • groupBy

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Country> groupBy​(int attribute,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<Country> C)
        This method groups the data set according to the selected attribute
        Parameters:
        attribute - is the attribute to be grouped by
        C - is the ArrayList of type Country that contains the data set to be grouped
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of type Country that contains the data set grouped according to the attribute

      • barChartDataCreating

        public static java.util.ArrayList<GUI.ChartData> barChartDataCreating​(java.util.ArrayList<Country> C,
                                                                      int attribute,
                                                                      int attribute2)
        This method creates the data list to be used in the Bar Chart creation
        Parameters:
        C - is the ArrayList of type Country that contains the data set to be converted
        attribute - is the first attribute to be used as the X-axis of the graph
        attribute2 - is the second attribute to be used as the Y-axis of the graph
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of type ChartData that contains the bar graph data in the correct format

                                                                       int attribute2,
                                                                       int attribute3)
        This method creates the data list to be used in the Line Chart creation
        Parameters:
        C - is the ArrayList of type Country that contains the data set to be converted
        attribute - is the first attribute to be used as the X-axis of the graph
        attribute2 - is the second attribute to be used as the Y-axis of the graph
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of type ChartData that contains the line graph data in the correct format
